page.title: 04School Activities
page.content: EDUCATION cont.At the end of term my dad and a friend run a{disco.}There is a special roller skate session in the playground.There is a{tree bank } in the Vicar's garden where the ones interested can go to study the trees.We collect conkers & acorns to plant.In school time we go somewhere in relation to the project we are doing-this year we went to Coldharbour Mill-a wool mill.The Lower class went to Exeter Museum.There is a{Dipper {Club.}The school has an unheated {swimming pool.}We also use it in the summer holidays.In the Summer Term we have School Sports & a skittle ball match against the mums. In winter boys play football & we play matches with other schools and against the Dads as well. The girls have netball and they play matches against local schools. Poughill school play in both our teams
